entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers. Wind east 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 8. POP 30%
